description: Jobedu creates high-quality, affordable “Arabized” products featuring beloved international characters, movies, TV shows, sports teams, and more.
Jobsity scouts and trains software developers in South America to serve US clients remotely.
Juris Technologies is an IT solutions company that provides financial management software (loan/financing origination, credit scoring, behavioral scoring, collection and recovery) and CRM solutions.

Justlife (previously Justmop) is an on-demand managed marketplace that enables customers to find, book, pay for, and rate cleaning service providers in a hassle-free manner through their mobile phones.
Kalibrr is a talent hiring platform intended to revolutionize the way candidates find careers and companies hire talent.
Kantox is a fintech company that offers foreign currency exchange and international payment solutions for corporate clients.
Kata.ai provides an intelligent chatbot that speaks and understands Indonesian languages to improve customer engagement.
Katalon offers an efficient software testing solution that automates the process of testing new products across platforms (Mobile, Web, Tablets) and browsers (Chrome, Safari, Microsoft Edge, etc).
Keepcon researches and develops artificial intelligence for semantic analysis and processing, enabling them to classify natural languages -either formally or informally written– in real time.
Kennemer Foods International, Inc. is an agribusiness company specializing in the sustainable growing, sourcing and trading of high-quality agricultural crops sourced from smallholder farmers.
Kenneth Cobonpue is a multi-awarded furniture designer and manufacturer from Cebu, Philippines, known globally for its unique designs and extensive clientele roster.
Kharabeesh is a modern media company and entertainment platform for Digital Creators.
Kibernum is an outsourcer of IT personnel.
Kinedu is an edtech company focused on early childhood, leveraging technology to distribute content and tools for parents wishing to improve their children’s development.
King Agro designs and manufactures carbon fiber booms for a new generation of high-performance agricultural machinery that improves productivity and optimizes profitability.
Kitabisa is Indonesia’s first and largest crowdsourcing platform.
Knotion’s digital education platform helps schools transition to a technology-based curriculum.
KO Group is a boutique fitness and wellness center in Latam.
Kokteyl develops projects, specializing in database applications, web and mobile applications, infrastructure and content management, mobile games and mobile advertising.
Kolektif House offers its members access to work spaces as well as a wide range of events and educational programs.
